attributes.action: Abolish Fuel VAT and Road Tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish Fuel VAT and Road Tax so everyone will pay the same whether they be a light or heavy vehicle user and, introduce National Fuel Price-capping on what suppliers and retailers can charge at the pumps.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=abolish+fuel&go=Go&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=abolish+fuel&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
